title: Synthetic Soundscapes: Navigating AIs Role in Musics Next Era

quotes.quote: If an AI creates a melody that sounds remarkably like the Beatles, where do we draw the line between homage and exploitation?
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: The fear, I think, stems from history. Musicians have been exploited for centuriesâ€”underpaid, manipulated, owned by labels.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: Generative AI in music is probably a generational thing.
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

quotes.quote: Will we find ways to honor the artist's likeness without appropriating it?
quotes.speaker: David Thyresson

author: David Thyresson
